meta.description: Determine the number of helicopter and car trips needed to transport fish while minimizing total time.

sets.name: MODES
sets.description: Modes of transportation available for fish transport.

params.name: capacity
params.description: Capacity of each mode of transportation in terms of number of fish per trip.

params.name: time_per_trip
params.description: Time taken per trip for each mode of transportation in minutes.

vars.name: trips
vars.description: Number of trips for each mode of transportation.

objective.name: min_total_time
objective.expr: sum(trips[m] * time_per_trip[m] for m in MODES)
objective.description: Minimize the total time needed for all trips.

constraints.name: fish_transport_requirement
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(trips[m] * capacity[m] for m in MODES)
constraints.description: At least 300 fish need to be transported.

constraints.name: helicopter_trip_limit
constraints.description: There can be at most 5 helicopter trips.

constraints.name: car_trip_minimum_percentage
constraints.description: At least 60% of the trips should be by car.
